Package io.crums.sldg

Class PathIntersector

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.PathIntersector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<RowIntersection>, java.util.Iterator<RowIntersection>
Direct Known Subclasses:
UniquePairIntersector
public class PathIntersector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<RowIntersection>, java.util.Iterator<RowIntersection>
An iteration over the intersections of a pair of paths.

Thread-safety

With the notable exception of the thread-safe iterator() method (which returns a reset clone of the instance) the behavior of instances is undefined under concurrent access.

See Also:
firstConflict()

    • collect

      public java.util.List<RowIntersection> collect()
      Collects and returns the remaining unique-pair intersections.
      Returns:
      non-null, read-only list of intersections in ascending #rowNumber() row numbers.
      See Also:
      #streamUniquePairs()

    • firstConflict

      public java.util.Optional<RowIntersection> firstConflict()
      Consumes the remaining intersections in this iteration until the first conflict is encountered and returns it, if any. Conflicts are arguably as important as valid intersections: a conflict proves that 2 paths do not belong to the same ledger.

    • iterator

      public PathIntersector iterator()
      Returns a new copy of this instance that starts the iteration from the beginning. Its iteration-state is independent of this instance.
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<RowIntersection>

    • stream

      public java.util.stream.Stream<RowIntersection> stream()
